1704.title: Quora collects all data you input and data of your device

tosdr.tldr: From Quora's terms: "store information that your computer or mobile device provides to us in connection with your use of the Quora Platform such as your browser type, type of computer or mobile device, browser language, IP address, mobile carrier, unique device identifier, location, and requested and referring URLs."

6440.quoteText: Use of the Quora Platform by anyone under 13 years of age is prohibited.
6440.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

6441.quoteText: Feel free to submit feedback at quora.com/contact. By submitting feedback, you agree to grant us the right, at our discretion, to use, disclose and otherwise exploit the feedback, in whole or part, freely and without compensation to you.
6441.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

6442.quoteText: This Agreement and any action arising out of your use of the Quora Platform will be governed by the laws of the State of California without regard to or application of its conflict of law provisions or your state or country of residence.
6442.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

6443.quoteText:
YOU AGREE THAT TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, QUORA ENTITIES WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY.
WITHOUT LIMITING THE FOREGOING, YOU AGREE THAT, TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, QUORA ENTITIES SPECIFICALLY WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, LOSS OF PROFITS, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, REPUTATIONAL HARM, OR LOSS OF DATA (EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES OR SUCH DAMAGES ARE FORESEEABLE) ARISING OUT OF OR IN ANY WAY CONNECTED WITH YOUR USE OF, OR INABILITY TO USE, THE QUORA PLATFORM.

tosdr.case: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials

6445.quoteText: Our content and materials are provided to you “as is,” without any guarantees.
6445.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

6446.quoteText: We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any content posted on the Quora Platform by anyone.
6446.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

10290.quoteText: You should consult their respective privacy policies for information about their practices.
10290.title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

tosdr.case: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

11798.quoteText: i>Pixels, web beacons, clear GIFs . These are tiny graphics with a unique identifier, similar in function to cookies, which we use to track the online movements of users of the Quora Platform and the web pages of users of our Ad Services, and to personalize content
11798.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11799.quoteText:
We Collect

We collect information directly from individuals, from third-parties, and automatically through the Quora Platform.
11799.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

11800.quoteText: We do not sell your personal data – such as your name and contact information
11800.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

11801.quoteText: To display interest-based advertising to you in the Quora Platform, to improve our advertising and measurement systems so we can show you relevant ads, to pre-fill forms in ads, and to measure the effectiveness and reach of ads and services.
11801.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

11802.quoteText: For marketing and promotional purposes, such as to send you news and newsletters, special offers, and promotions, or to otherwise contact you about products or information we think may interest you, including information about third-party products and services.</li
11802.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11803.quoteText: We may use internal and third-party analytics tools, including <i>Google Analytics
11803.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

11804.quoteText: You can manage all your email and notice preferences in your account profile settings, under your Emails and Notifications settings. If you opt-out of receiving emails or other notifications about recommendations or other information we think may interest you, we may still send you transactional emails about your account or any services you have requested or received from us.
11804.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

11805.quoteText: You may opt out of interest-based ads from these third-party ad networks.
11805.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

11806.quoteText: For more information, including detailed information about how to submit a request for takedown if you believe content on the Quora Platform infringes your intellectual property rights, please read our <i>Copyright Policy
11806.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

tosdr.case: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

11807.quoteText: If we change our privacy policies and procedures, we will post those changes on this page. If we make any changes to this Privacy Policy that materially change how we treat your personal information, we will endeavor to provide you with reasonable notice of such changes, such as via prominent notice in the Quora Platform or to your email address of record, and where required by law, we will obtain your consent or give you the opportunity to opt out of such changes.
11807.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
